name: Smack A Trump
description:
Have you ever been annoyed that trump won?

Have you ever disagreed with trump's decision?

Have you ever been annoyed or angry at Donald Trump?

Then this is the Perfect game for you. This game is a clicker-style game where the whole point is to smack trump. Have some fun smack trump see how high you can get the punch and smack trump.

Have fun and punch trump.

Download for Windows Only || HTML for supported web browsers but you have to use the fullscreen button
